page.title: 15Weekly "HEXHAM COURANT"News.
page.content: { The Northumbria Police}this week announced plans to start neighbourhood {Watch Schemes}in the Tynedale area. Following an increase in the crime rate in the region it is hoped that the public will respond to the initiative which has proved successful in other areas of the country. Residents in the east end of Hexham will receive questionnaires from the police and their responses will be analysed and correlated.The Police hope that each street in the area will establish a"contact point"and have special constables.Eventually it is hoped that the residents will organise themselves and expand throughout the area,but in the mean while they will operate under the auspices of a P.C.The organiser P.C.Ibbetson said "We hope the plan will be good for all-police and public
